title: Cozy Family Home with Modern Amenities in Quiet Pila Suburb
description: This welcoming house offers three spacious bedrooms and three modern bathrooms, making it an excellent long-term home for growing families. The home spans 155 square meters, benefitting from a contemporary layout with an airy open-plan living area and plenty of natural light. Residents can enjoy conveniences usually reserved for city living, such as a reception desk and a cozy residents' lounge—perfect for relaxation or small gatherings.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the low-urban-level Suburb neighborhood of Pila, this home offers a true community-oriented environment. Featuring calm streets, green spaces, and friendly neighbors, it is ideal for those looking to settle in an area known for its family-friendly atmosphere. Quick access to nearby highways makes commuting effortless and connects residents to shops, schools, and services just a short drive away.
target_buyer: Perfect for families or long-term renters desiring a quiet, stable community and easy road access for daily travel or outdoor excursions.
market_positioning: This property fills a unique market need as an up-to-date, amenity-rich home in a low-urbanization area. It appeals to those who want city-like comforts and modern ideals without the density or hustle of city living.
